synopsis.text: Together, the four members of the idol group 'Uchuu Seifuku' are on a mission to claim the title of the universe's top idol group! Ecchan, Sapphi, Rocco, and Moffan are determined to perform at the prestigious Space Budokan and win fame across the cosmos. However, their journey is not without challenges; just before each live performance, an unexpected problem arises! Catch this original and exclusive short anime on DMM TV, and join these ambitious girls as they strive for interstellar stardom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
